markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Silencing Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1244)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 10</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Due to their connection to the shop’s proprietor, all Pathfinder Society agents have access to the items from Barghest’s Bin_

**Price** 125 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** arrow, bolt

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Silencing ammunition_ is particularly dense and seems to dampen sounds around it. On a successful Strike, an activated piece of _silencing ammunition_ creates a 2nd-level [_silence_](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) effect on the target. The target can resist the effects of the ammunition with a successful DC 25 Will save, though it takes a –2 circumstance penalty if the Strike was a critical hit. While the effect is active, the target can use an Interact action to try to tug out the arrow or bolt and end the effect early; this requires a successful DC 25 Will save.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Silencing Ammunition

On a successful Strike, an activated piece of silencing ammunition creates a 2nd-level silence effect on the target. The target can resist the effects of the ammunition with a successful DC 25 Will save, though it takes a –2 circumstance penalty if the Strike was a critical hit. While the effect is active, the target can use an Interact action to try to tug out the arrow or bolt and end the effect early; this requires a successful DC 25 Will save.
